attributes.action: Focus more on motorway driving during the driving tests and lessons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that people dont seem to be able to use a motorway properly ie middle lane drivers, im 18 and having just sat the driving tests I found that I wasn't really questioned on motorway driving so I took a pass plus course which was great at teaching me on this subject, but If It was complusory to focus one or two lessons on the motorway and  more questions during both parts of the theory test new drivers would have more of an idea on how to use motorways there fore improving the safety on the roads and making motorway driving easier.
